entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
